name: Ethan Look
objective: Summer internship at a consumer-facing mobile/web company using and growing my skills in iOS (Swift), ReactJS, Node and Javascript.

technicalExperience.title: Tidepool, San Francisco, CA
technicalExperience.subtitle: Intern, June 2015 - August 2015, June 2016 - August 2016
technicalExperience.description: A non-profit startup developing a secure data platform and mobile/web apps for people living with Type 1 Diabetes. I was responsible for:

infoList.description: Development of a command-line toolkit for data processing, analysis, and conversion to xlsx format.
Development of a client-side data visualization for generating printed reports.
Development of an iOS framework for interfacing with data ingestion REST APIs.
Development of an iOS application to add context to aggregated data.
Collaborated closely with design and product management.

technicalExperience.title: VandyApps, Student Organization
technicalExperience.subtitle: President, May 2016 - Present; Vice President, January - May 2016
technicalExperience.description: A club for students interested in expanding their software-development skills and preparing themselves to be industry-ready engineers.

infoList.description: Coordination of weekly general body meetings including member tech talks, learning sessions, and visits from external guests.
Fundraising for club-sponsored events and resources, such as our tech library.
Preparation of club-sponsored hack nights and coding competitions.
Development of teaching materials for introductory iOS sessions.

technicalExperience.title: Data Structures Class
technicalExperience.subtitle: Teaching Assistant and Grader, January 2016 - Present
technicalExperience.description: The second course in Vanderbilt's computer science curriculum which introduces data structures and their applications, problem solving techniques, and well-designed software.

infoList.description: Grading of weekly programming assignments and projects.
Student support via weekly office hours.
Grading of three written midterms and the final exam.

technicalExperience.title: Mega Rocket Blaster
technicalExperience.subtitle: Independent Developer
